A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I gave this film a shot. It was unfortunate that they gave a guy like Rian Johnson so much creative power in the middle of a 9 episode story arc...  It's also unfortunate that JJ setup excitement and expectations only to have Rian actually write something to diffuse any kind of excitement and expectations. I have never hated a film as much as I hate this one. It was so bad\, calling it crap isn't enough.
